articles.title: WATCH: What does the truck driver shortage in Europe have to do with the Philippines? - Rappler
articles.description: European transport companies are looking to the Philippines to fill in the need for more truck drivers
articles.content: An estimated shortage of 400,000 truck drivers is compounding supply chain issues in Europe. Truck drivers transport about 75% of all inland freight across the borders of the European Union. Unscrupu… [+844 chars]

articles.title: 'The dream comes true': Croatia to start using euros in January - BreakingNews.ie

articles.content:
European Union leaders have agreed that Croatia will join the group of countries using the euro in January, bringing the number of nations sharing the currency to 20.
